import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import Swiper from 'swiper'; import 'swiper/css'; import 'swiper/css/navigation'; import 'swiper/css/pagination'; const GalleryComponent = () => { useEffect(() => { const swiper = new Swiper('.swiper', { direction: 'horizontal', grabCursor: true, speed: 500, effect: 'slide', loop: true, mousewheel: { enabled: true, invert: false, sensitivity: 1, }, }); return () => { swiper.destroy(true, true); }; }, []); return (
